author: John Kehoe
title: The Big State Is Back
description: Image credit: istock In the News cited Steven J. Davis via Australian Financial Review Magazine [Subscription required] Economic policymaking has been turned on its head as the Australian government deliberately engineers a recession to preserve lives.
content:
The government and taxpayer-backstopped banks will ultimately decide which businesses survive and which die.
The Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) has become the lender of last resort by providing at least $90 billion of ultra-cheap 0.25 per cent loans to comm… [+7559 chars]
